content: the nebbia sweater crochet pattern is perfect for beginners looking to create a stylish and cozy pullover this pattern includes sizes ranging from xs to 5x making it suitable for a wide range of body types the top-down construction and raglan sleeves provide a flattering fit while the oversized design offers a trendy and comfortable look with clear written instructions and video tutorials available crocheters of all skill levels can easily follow along the dreamy bulky weight yarn from red heart adds a luxurious feel to this sweater ensuring a soft and warm finished product whether you prefer working flat or in the round this pattern accommodates both techniques allowing for customization based on your preferences **unique features-** available in sizes xs-5x beginner-friendly crochet pattern top-down construction with raglan sleeves oversized fit for a trendy look includes written instructions and video tutorials **materials needed-** yarn 450-1800 yards of red heart dreamy bulky weight yarn hook 7mm us size none gauge 10 stitches by 6 row = 4 inches in 10 double_crochet x 6 row
